DOC.brief_summary: The aim pilot study analyze effect 12-week specific jump training compare conventional therapy patient chronic functional instability ankle . It evaluate extent symptom chronic functional instability ankle influence everyday life .
DOC.brief_title: Jumping Exercises Approach Individuals With Chronic Ankle Instability
DOC.detailed_description: There need ; 1. homogeneous sub- group chronic functional instability ankle . 2 . Studies need old patient ( 50 year ) also take account woman . 3 . In addition , study perform clinical environment also time clinically adapted test use form measurement . ( Hiller et al . , 2011 ) .
DOC.criteria: Ankle injury 6 month ago Chronic instability Functional instability ankle Experience proprioceptive exercise Foot surgery Fresh ankle injury Acute foot pain sign inflammation Mechanical / anatomical ankle instability Athletes regularly jump exercise ( eg volleyball , basketball ) Taking medication affect balance coordination Diseases affect balance Serious disease tumor , infection , neuropathy , severe articular degeneration NonGermanspeaking patient
